string.text:
Developed in Israel by Command Arms & Acessories (CAA), the AK-Alfa assault rifle was first presented to the public in 2016. This weapon is marketed under two brands - "Kalashnikov USA" and "Kalashnikov Israel".
 The AK-Alpha assault rifle is an attempt to improve the ergonomics of the AK rifle while maintaining its main advantages - high reliability and ease of maintenance. The base for the AK-Alpha is the receiver, the barrel with the gas tube, the bolt group and the main components of the trigger of the Russian-made Saiga carbine.
 It seems this weapon was brought to the Zone by the ISG faction.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for Picatinny/weaver except of scopes with very low mounting: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: 5.56x45 compatible suppressor
